like fiend be omniscient of past present not future can not yet undertake to say sir leicester dedlock be only baronet there be mightier baronet than family be a old a hill infinitely more respectable to doll when be alone together now dolly be not clever know very well must be patient with like dear so used to sit propped up in great arm chair with beautiful complexion rosy lip staring at not so stranger portly important looking gentleman dressed in black with white cravat large gold watch seal pair of gold eye glass large seal ring upon little finger said godmother in undertone be child then said in naturally stern way of speaking be esther sir gentleman put up eye glass to look at said come here dear shook hand with asked to take off bonnet looking at while when have complied said ah afterwards yes then taking off eye glass folding in red case leaning back in arm chair turning case about in two hand gave godmother nod upon godmother said may go upstairs esther made curtsy left must have be two year afterwards be almost fourteen when one dreadful night godmother sat at fireside be reading aloud be listening have come down at nine o'clock a always did to read bible to be reading from st john how saviour stooped down writing with finger in dust when brought sinful woman to so when continued asking lifted up said unto 'he be without sin among let first cast stone at ' be stopped by godmother rising putting hand to head cry out in awful voice from quite part of book ye therefore lest coming suddenly find sleeping what say unto say unto watch ' in instant while stood friend pursues mr chadband utterly rejecting obliterating mr snagsby suggestion why can not fly be because be calculated to walk be must walk friend without strength must not what must do without thence path wound underneath gateway through court yard where principal entrance be hurried quickly on by stable where none deep voice seemed to be whether in murmuring of wind through strong mass of
